      • collidePoint

        public boolean collidePoint(float mX,
                            float mY)
        Determines whether a coordinate point lies within the bounds of this TextField
        Parameters:
        mX - The x position of the coordinate
        mY - The y position of the coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean that determines whether or not the point lies within the bounds of the rectangle

      • shapeDraw

        public void shapeDraw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer sr,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFontCache> fnt,
                      boolean focused)
        Draws the TextField
        Parameters:
        sr - ShapeRenderer for drawing the TextField
        fnt - BitmapFont for determining the width of the text, should be the same font that the BitmapFontCache is using
        focused - boolean for whether or not this TextField is currently focused on
